Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Extends certain deadlines related to a tax abatement for certain alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings
Summary: Extends certain deadlines related to a tax abatement for certain alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to extending certain deadlines related to a tax abatement for certain alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings
